mapper.select: select goal_count as count, start_date as "start", end_date as "end" ,goal_set as set_count,exercise_name as title, exercise_partials from subscribe s join routine r on s.routine_no = r.routine_no join rou_exe ro on r.routine_no = ro.routine_no join exercise e on e.exercise_no = ro.exercise_no where r.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update play_exe set play_at=#{start} where play_no=#{playNo}
mapper.insert: insert into play_exe values(SEQ_PLAY_EXE.NEXTVAL, #{count}, #{setCount}, #{start}, #{id}, (select exercise_no from exercise where exercise_name = #{title}))
mapper.update: update play_exe set count=#{count}, set_count=#{setCount}, play_at = #{start}, exercise_no = (select exercise_no from exercise where exercise_name = #{title}) where play_no = #{playNo}

UPDATE play_exe e SET e.count = #{count} , e.exercise_no = (select exercise_no from exercise where exercise_name = #{title}) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM calendar c WHERE c.play_no = e.play_no and c.calendar_no=#{calendarNo})
